      public void save(Professor professor, String password)
      Save Professor t to Database and add the ID generate by the database to professor, if the professor exist it will only update the ID
      Parameters:
      professor - Professor object to save
      password - password to save inside the database

    • save

      public void save(long slotId, long[] professorIdArray) throws SQLException
      Save into join table professor_slot, considering both are already saved in their respective tables Should only be used by SlotDAO
      Parameters:
      slotId - Slot entity id to save
      professorIdArray - Professor entity id to save
      Throws:
      SQLException - thrown Exception in case of Errors, especially if one of the two ids doesn't exist in entity tables
